actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 95-900.
Measure called up as privileged matter in House.

official_title: A resolution to provide funds for the expenses of the investigations and studies to be conducted by the Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 95-900) Authorizes expenditures, not to exceed $2,613,590, by the House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs for inquiries and investigations.

titles.title: A resolution to provide funds for the expenses of the investigations and studies to be conducted by the Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.
